name: Electric Eric
description:
A resource management tower defence game where you play as the animals of a Tasmanian nature reserve being destroyed by a Dam greenlit by Eric Reece

How long can you and your makeshift weapons survive against the onslaught of Eric Reece worker clones? The lake is drying out and your towers can't survive on dry land, and worker who makes it past is going to build that dam faster

Features:-

A dynamically changing map where the water dries up as the dam is built leaving less space to build on

Espionage towers, train up the kangaroos to masquerade as workers and infiltrate the dam to sabotage the workers inside

Build lumber yards and resident buildings to obtain wood

Build a variety of different weapon towers to fend off the workers

Credits:-

Lead Artist - Caleb

Assistant Artist - Reon Gayle

Lead 3D Modeller - Maxine Franklin

Assistant 3D Modeller - Ben Webb, Reon Gayle

Level Designer - Maxine Franklin

Programmers - Ben Webb, Reon Gayle, Maxine Franklin

Designers - Caleb, Maxine Franklin, Ben Webb, Reon Gayle
